name: Infinite wheel (Ithildin)
description:
Hit the right beats in time to aid Hamsey in its struggle to get break free from the wheel. There's no loss condition other than the inane repetition of a set of bland music loops!

  • Beat controls: WASD/Arrow keys/D-pad / Left stick
  • Esc to restart

(Any key in menus seems to only work with keyboard / mouse)
